about_the_game:
In Stick Mountain, become an elite S-Co agent tasked with eliminating deadly threats across different worlds. Master elemental powers, craft powerful gear, and forge your own path to shape the fate of entire civilizations.

  • A Sci-fi Adventure:

Become immersed as an S-Co operative who traverses the realms, visiting vastly different and exciting planets and locations!  

  •  An RPG Experience:

Create your own path by choosing how you want to play with a wide variety of characters to play as, equipment to craft, and abilities to level up.

  • Play With Your Friends:

Experience the excitement of Stick Mountain with your friends! Work together to save the realms with up to 6 players at a time! 

  • Challenge Yourself:

Select the difficulty of your character, activate shrines, encounter enemies while exploring, and work through different difficulty modes for each level!

  • Become a Hero:

Show the civilians of the realms your heroism by taking on tasks that no one dares to attempt! Become the greatest hero the realms have ever seen!  

  • Go Above and Beyond:

Defend sacred objects from attackers and survive in order to receive big bonuses!

  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit), Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX 11/12 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
